events.name: Flex & Seal Shipping Roll Cb inviteonly
events.description:
An easier way to ship has arrived, just in time for the holidays! Scotch™ Flex & Seal Shipping Roll eliminates the need for boxes, fillers and tape, which will save you up to 50% on time, supplies and space compared to boxes. Find it at your local Staples.

 

If you're selected as a Chatterbox, you'll get a great Chat Pack:

  • 1 10’ Scotch™ Flex & Seal Shipping Roll
  • 1 Product flyer
  • 6 Staples discount coupons to share with your friends

Apply now and if selected, we'll deliver a Chat Pack right to your doorstep. You don't have to throw a party, but you'll want to celebrate when it arrives! After you try [[variable|key::Custom.product_name]], chat about your experience using it, share your opinions and post a review on the site. That's it!

Get the chatter started! Apply now.

events.name: Regular HP
events.description:
People love dogs, but not dog breath, so get all the furry friends in your life together and show their owners how to treat their dogs deliciously with GREENIES™ BREATH BUSTER™ Bites. They're the mouth-wowing treat that dogs can't wait to sink their teeth into. Irresistibly tasty. Incredibly powerful. So get the pack together and have a great time fetching their flying discs, getting the best belly rubs and enjoying fresh breath with GREENIES™ BREATH BUSTER™ Bites.

[[variable|key::Custom.approved_applicant_location]]

If you’re selected and confirmed as a host, your exclusive Party Pack will contain:

  • GREENIES™ BREATH BUSTER™ Bites
  • GREENIES™ coupons for guests
  • GREENIES™-branded flying discs
  • And more

events.name: Ripple Street Automation CHATTERBUY 46024
events.description:
Join us for a groundbreaking event where industry leaders, innovators, and experts converge to explore the latest trends, advancements, and opportunities in automation technology. The Automation Innovation Summit is your gateway to the future of automation, where you'll gain invaluable insights, forge strategic partnerships, and discover cutting-edge solutions that will drive your business forward.

Event Highlights:

  1. Keynote Presentations: Hear from renowned thought leaders and visionaries as they share their insights on the current state and future direction of automation technology.

events.name: Kraft Heinz Refund
events.description: The Kraft Heinz Refund event is your exclusive ticket to explore the unique taste of Kraft Singles. This event, designed for cheese enthusiasts and Kraft lovers alike, invites you to savor the melt-in-your-mouth goodness of Kraft Singles, and share your cheesy creations and experiences with a community of fellow cheese admirers.
events.promotionalText: 🧀💖 Discover the creamy, dreamy world of Kraft Singles.

events.name: Self-Esteem Sunday Watch Party
events.description:
Embrace your sports era with Dove! Gear up for the ultimate game day and help boost confidence and sports knowledge in young competitors. Participating in sports can improve physical and mental health, promote teamwork, and increase self-confidence in kids. With our exclusive Party Pack, you will enjoy sports focused educational tools and fun football-themed games to encourage your fearless young athletes on and off the field. 🏈💪  

1,000 lucky Ripple Street parents will receive everything you need to host an awesome Self-Esteem Sunday Watch Party with your sports fan and 5+ of their friends. In return, hosts will download the Dove Confidence Kit, write a review of the kit, upload a photo of the game day watch party, and share their experience on Instagram.

events.name: Canelo vs. Jacobs Viewing HpHybrid
events.description:
Saul "Canelo" Alvarez is scaling two weight classes in a bid for Sergey "Krusher" Kovalev's title, and you have the chance to watch them fight for the Light Heavyweight World Title on November 2. Be a part of the action and celebrate those who "Never Stop. Never Settle." with the world's first and finest VSOP Cognac — Hennessy V.S.O.P Privilège.

You must be 21 or older to host this event. [[variable|key::Custom.approved_applicant_location]]

If you’re selected and confirmed as a host, your exclusive Party Pack will contain:

  • Visa gift card for your party
  • Canelo hats*
  • Canelo t-shirts*
  • And more

*If you’re selected and confirmed as a host, NOTE we will not be sending you specifically requested t-shirt and/or hat sizes. All Party Pack garment item sizes will be the same for all Party Packs.

NOTE: U.S. Law does not allow us to send alcohol to our hosts for free... But if you’re selected and confirmed as a host, your Party Pack will still be full of awesome goodies!

[[variable|key::Custom.client_alcoholmandatories]]

You must be 21 or older to apply, host and attend this party. State laws do not allow us to provide alcoholic beverages to our hosts. Guests of the party who aren’t registered with House Party must sign a waiver (available in the Favors tab) and return it to us by either faxing it to 1-914-801-5675 or emailing it to waivers@ripplestreet.com.

Be sure to catch a safe ride home — no drinking and driving. Please Drink Responsibly.

Please only post photos and videos of people 21 years of age or older and all persons must have given their permission. Photos must not defame or invade the publicity or privacy rights of any person, living or deceased, or otherwise infringe upon any person’s personal or proprietary rights. Photos must not: Depict individuals younger than 21 years of age; Contain material that violates or infringes another's rights, including, but not limited to, copyright, patent, trade name/trademark, and/or rights of privacy or publicity, slander, libel, or portrayal in a false light; Contain content depicting violence, nudity, profanity, illegal, or sexually explicit activity, or any content that is inappropriate, indecent, obscene, hateful, tortious, defamatory, slanderous or libelous; Contain content that promotes bigotry, racism, hatred or harm against any group or individual or promotes discrimination based on race, gender, religion, nationality, disability, sexual orientation or age; Contain material that is unlawful, in violation of, or contrary to, any laws or regulations; Contain any deleterious material, such as, but not limited to, virus, bugs, or tracking, or other embedded material or programs; and Contain any excessive consumption of beer or individuals who appear intoxicated.

events.name: [Please Don't Use this Event] Blue Bunny® Treat Yo’Self Chatterbox
events.description:
NOTE: This event is not open to residents of CA, CO, KS, LA, MN, ND, NV, TN, and WI due to dairy law restrictions. If you reside in one of these states, please check out one of our other open events.

Blue Bunny invites you to try a variety of their frozen treats and the FUN that comes along with them. After all, Blue Bunny is the champion of making fun! Indulge in perfectly portioned frozen treats including Blue Bunny® Mini Bars, Mini Swirls®, and Twist Cones which come in the oh-so-delicious flavors you love like Vanilla Caramel Crunch, Strawberry Shortcake, Chocolate Peanut Butter, and so many more. The best part? You can never have too mini. 😉 

5,600 lucky Ripple Street community members will receive a gratuity coupon to try Blue Bunny frozen desserts at home. In return, participants will be asked to write a review and share their experience on Instagram.

events.name: ORGANIC INDIA
events.description:
The wonders of Tulasi
Throughout india Tulasi is considered "The Queen of Herb's and is revered as a scred plant infused with healing powers.Traditionally grown in an earthen pot in every family home or garden, Tulsi's remarkable life -enhancing qualities ,repeatedly noted in ancient indian scriptures dating back over 5000 years are now here for you to fully enjoy..

If you’re selected and confirmed as a host, your exclusive Party Pack will contain:

  • Gift card and coupons for you to get everything you need for your party
  • Blue Moon® products
  • And more

events.name: Ocen spray best chatter box
events.description:
Experience the crisp, fresh taste of cranberries without compromise. Ocean Spray® Zero Sugar Cranberry Juice Drink is made with real fruit juice and no artificial sweeteners.* It’s a Zero Sugar beverage done right. (pssst, also available in Mixed Berry). 😉  

1,750 lucky Ripple Street community members will have the opportunity to try Ocean Spray® Zero Sugar Cranberry Juice Drink for free from their local Walmart. In return, we’ll ask participants to write a review and post about their experience on Instagram.   

*Contains stevia leaf extract, which has been processed.  ssssss

events.name: Fourth of July Party
events.description:
Planning a summer party for 4th of July? Bring Beyond Meat® to the party and introduce your friends and family to a better for you BBQ. Beyond Meat® products are made from simple ingredients that offer a good source of protein with all the flavor you want with no cholesterol, no added hormones or antibiotics and no GMOs.

There are two ways to experience this event, so choose wisely 😉  

  • Wanna throw an epic party of 5+ people? 1,250 selected participants will receive a pack full of goodies to throw an epic 4th of July extravaganza. 
  • Would you rather keep this one to yourself? 1,500 selected participants will receive gratuity coupons to pick up Beyond Meat® at their local store and try it at home. 

You know the drill: selected event participants will be asked to share about their experience on social media and through product reviews. Ready to get your grill on? Apply now!

events.name: Dental Chews Chatterbox 11
events.description:
Reshape your dog’s daily dental routine with BLUE Dental Chews. 🐾🦴 

Looking for a new dental routine for your dog? This Chatterbox is MINT for you! Be one of the first Pet Parents to try this new dog chew formulated with veterinary guidance. This natural dog treat offers a 3-in-1 clean through 50 unique ridges and grooves designed to support plaque and tartar control, freshen breath, and promote healthy teeth and gums. Made with the finest ingredients and real chicken dogs love, you can feel good about treating your pup to BLUE Dental Chews. 

400 lucky Ripple Street Pet Parents will receive BLUE Dental Chews (in small or medium depending on the size of your dog). In return, you will be required to write a review and upload a photo of your pup trying them.

events.name: Lankato
events.description:
NOTE: Unfortunately this event is not open to residents of VT and WY. If you reside in one of these states, please check out one of our other open events.

Have your cake and eat it too with Lakanto Classic Monkfruit Sweetener! This guilt-free white sugar substitute is naturally sweet and contains zero calories. Sweeten up your everyday eats by sprinkling it in coffee, on cereal, oatmeal, yogurt, and more. You don’t have to cheat when it's monk fruit sweet! 😉 ......

1,000 lucky Ripple Street community members will receive a Target gift card and recipes to try Lakanto Classic Monkfruit Sweetener and in return will be asked to write a review and share a photo from their experience. Pretty sweet, huh? Apply now!

events.name: Secret Sauce Hybrid Chatterbox
events.description:
Secret’s out! Try new Ranch topping sauces with a bold, tasty twist. Hidden Valley® Ranch Secret Sauce comes in Original, Spicy and Smokehouse and goes great on all your favorite foods like burgers, tacos, fries and more. Starting April 1, you can pick up all three in the Hidden Valley® Ranch aisle at your local Walmart and enjoy restaurant taste at home.

If you're selected as a Chatterbox, you'll get a great Chat Pack:

  • 1 Hidden Valley® Ranch Secret Sauce - Original OR Spicy OR Smokehouse
  • 1 Hidden Valley® Ranch Secret Sauce info postcard

NOTE: If you're selected as a Chatterbox, you will receive 1 of the 3 varieties of Hidden Valley® Ranch Secret Sauce to try. We'll do our best to send you the flavor you designated as your first choice, but we can't guarantee that'll be the one you receive.

Apply now and if selected, we'll deliver a Chat Pack right to your doorstep. You don't have to throw a party, but you'll want to celebrate when it arrives! After you try [[variable|key::Custom.product_name]], chat about your experience and what you enjoyed it on, share your opinions and post a review on the site. That's it!

Get the chatter started! Apply now.
